metadata.title: CVE-2016-4021 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The read_binary function in buffer.c in pgpdump before 0.30 allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop andCPU consumption) via crafted input, as demonstrated by the \xa3\x03 string.

criterions.comment: pgpdump: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
